title: Test `run-pass/generator/size-moved-locals.rs` fails on WASM

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Due to a regression in `compiletest` some `run-pass` tests weren't run properly for some time and this is one of the regressions that slipped through during that time.

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/62797#issuecomment-513279794
```
2019-07-19T15:47:51.8482480Z ---- [run-pass] run-pass/generator/size-moved-locals.rs stdout ----

2019-07-19T15:47:51.8482703Z status: exit code: 101
```
